channel.title: Xtreme Hardcore Nerds
channel.description: Three crazied fanboys somehow mange to come together inside a secure building and proceed to bring order to the insane masses with the most relevent industry news on gaming, comics, and movies.
channel.itunes:author: DarkReaper
channel.itunes:subtitle: XHN
channel.itunes:summary: A Podcast done by three overly devoted nerds getting togather to disscuss weekly news on gaming, comics, movies, and all things nerd related. A cast for those who need advice on what games to look out for or just to hear the F**** up banter of nerds about the things that make us what we are.

item.dc:creator: Stephen C

item.title: E3: Quantic Dream's new game Beyond is shown
item.dc:creator: Stephen C

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 06-03-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
On the heels of E3, this edition of the XHN podcast we talk the settlement of Activision Vs. West/Zepella lawsuit. What are the details, who came out on top, Have to tune in and find out. Also on the show we talk Battlefield 3 going premium, a new Gears game is on the way from Epic, Also CD Projeks starts working on a new RPG, Naughty Bear makes a return to PSN and XBLA, THQ finds a new VP, Donkey Kong has a new King of Kong title holder, Aliens goes Collectors, Expendables becoming a TV series, Resident Evil goes Viral, Dark Knight Rises and Iron Man 3 news, Image announces a new on-going series, James Robinson brings a "Iconinc" Character out of the closet, and so much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!!
Gaming News about 4 Mins in
Movie News about 52 Mins in
Comic News about 1 Hour 20 Mins in

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 05-27-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
On a dark and stormy evening in Minnesota, 3 nerds came together to provide the world with the knowlege that they needed to make it through their days. This week on the XHN podcast we review Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier, and Dragon's Dogma. Also we talk Bungie and Activision's exclusive deal for "Destiny", We also cover the Street Fighter 25th Anniversary Box Set, 38 Studios and Big Huge Games closing their doors, Peter Molyneux's first Post Microsift game has some details, release dates come and change for some major titles, Thor 2 gets a villian, MAchete Kills gets another Hollywood Hottie, Red 2 working on becoming Zorro?, GI Joe gets delayed, Ryan Renalds to become the Highlander?, The Stan Lee awards were given out, A new look at Superman Earth One Vol. 2The Crow and Wolverine make their big returns, and so so much more. Thanks as always for listening and have a great week. PEACE!!
Gaming News about 12 mins
Movie News about 58 mins
Comic News about 1 hour 34 mins
Ghost Recon Review about 1 hour 52 mins
Dragons Dogma Review about 2 hour 6 mins

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 05-20-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
Hello again Nerds to another exciting edition of EHN!! This week we have a big big show for you as we review Diablo 3 and Max Payne 3, We also talk about the big Fall of Duty lawsuit between Activision and West & Zepella formally of Infinity Ward, Now of Respawn Entertainment. Also this week we declassify the contents of the Borderlands 2 and Halo 4 collectors editions with prices, Darksiders 2 gets a release date, Another AAA title moves to Q1 of 2013, Sony leaks more Mass Effect news, CAPCOM tries to defend their on disc DLC program, Blizzard apologizes for Diablo 3, The Walking Dead Game hits 1 Million, Sin City 2 gets a date, Skyfall releases it's first poster, More Iron Man 3 news, The CW's Arrow gets it's first details, Phantom Lady comes to "The New 52", Image coming out with a new zombie comic, Marvel wants to tell us about the "First X-Men" and we show off the 4 minute preview for "The Amazing Spider-Man" from Columbia Pictures. All this and so much more. Thanks for listening as always and PEACE!!
Gaming News Starts 13 mins in
Movie News Starts 1 hour 7 mins in
Comic News Starts 1 hour 35 mins in
Max Payne Review Starts 1 hour 57 mins in
Diablo 3 Review Starts 2 hours 8 mins in

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 05-13-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
This week The Nerds cast covers Bioshock Infinite and the impending Bioshock movie deal. We also talk about Multiplayer coming to God of War, Xbox going with the cellular model to sell systems, Kingdom Hearts 3 might be making a debut on consoles sooner then later, Halo books to link to Halo 4, E3 news abound, Avengers movie sets records and Disney's not done with them yet, Marvel and Valient Comics have something in common, The CBLDF gets a new member and so so much more. Thanks for listening and watching as always. PEACE!!
Gaming News Starts about 4 Mins In.
Movie News Starts about 49 Mins In
Comic News Starts about 61 Mins In

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 05-06-12 Part 2
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: Holy Comic Weekend Batman... This week on the Nerds we didicate the whole show to the world of Comics and after discussing all the comics we picked up during Free Comic Book Day we wrapped up this weeks show with a 4 corners review of The AVENGERS!!!! Did Marvel pull of the best superhero movie of the year so far and possibly ever or did hey suceed in becoming the next Batman and Robin?? You'll have to listen and find out. PEACE!!!

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 05-06-12 Part 1
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: Holy Comics Galore Batman. This week on the Nerds Podcast we dedicate this whole program to the world of comics. Thats right we are fresh off the heels of Free Comic Book Day and we have all the books to review. We have the New 52, Avengers, The Guild, Buffy, Star Wars, Transformers, Atomic Robo, and more more and more. Yep. I'm pretty sure I can't say more anymore. Ok, Im done I promise. We also reviewed 2 New Titles from DC in Earth 2 and World's Finest. So if you like Comics this one will be the show for you. We will be back to the normal format next week. PEACE!!

item.title: After Thoughts for the week of 05-05-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: It's a comics world for me and this weekend is one of the biggest of the year. This weekend we have The Avengers debuting in the states, Free Comic Book Day, and so much more, thats why we at EHN decided to sit down for this weeks After Thoughts and talk nothing but comics. Now for-warnded that this is a 2 1/2 hours show so we had alot to hit upon. We mainly hit the topic of what comic stories or what comic charactor we would like to see on the big screen. And at the end Gunnar and Andrew have a poinent discussion about the world of Animation and whether it can hold it's own against the Live Action market. Very good discussion and a very good episode. If you download one episode of the Nerds this year make it this one. PEACE!!

item.title: Podcast for the week of 04-29-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
This week the Nerds debate whether or not Top Gun 2 should be made...YES that was the BIG shake up story of the week. TOP GUN 2! Also we talk the new game by Shinji Mikami, Madden gets a cover model, Leasure Suit Larry is making his return, Batman goes Game of the Year, Sony introduces a Battle Royale, Iron Man 3 news galore, Judge Dreed finds a rating, Johnny Depp explains his character choice for Tonto, Marvel Movies galore, Robot Chicken goes Superfriends, Axe Cop to become an animated series, Tank Girl goes Digital, The History of Cybertron is revealed to us and so so much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!!
Gaming News starts about 7 Mins
Movie News Starts about 35 Mins
Comics News Starts about 71 Mins
Prototype 2 Review Starts about 98 Mins

item.title: Resident Evil Creator Making A Return To Survival Horror

item.title: Harley Quin DLC announced in Arkham City Game of the Year Edition

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 04-22-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
This week on the Nerd's Cast we Review SkullGirls, We also talk Halo 4 and maybe some contreversary with a couple of the voice actors cast for the game. We also talk the current state of THQ, EA officially announces Crysis 3, Kratos might be making his PS3 return sooner then later, Prey 2 not cancelled but not coming out this year...(sound familiar Duke Nukem Fans), Family Guy and Diablo 3 start their open betas, Marvel keeps working their movie gold mine, also work a deal with China? Could this be a sign of things to come. Graphic Textbooks might be hitting classrooms thanks to Kickstarter, The King Reviews Smallville #1, and so so much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!!
Gaming News Starts about 4 Mins
Movie News Starts about 40 Mins
Comic News Starts about 52 Mins
SkullGirls Reviews starts about 92 Mins

item.title: The World Ends With You getting a sequel?
item.dc:creator: Stephen C

item.title: AfterThoughts from 04-19-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: That's right it's been a week of returns. A return of the King from the land of chicago, also it's the return of the Extreme Hardcore Nerds After Thoughts!! This time on the After Thoughts we talk the current state of the gaming industry. We go indepth about the cost of games and what all really go into making them, How the industry has changed just in the past10 years and how we feel about DRM and the possible enevitablility of the days of no more physical medium. And finally we go back in time and we talk about the franchises we would like to see come back as a remake or finally get a sequal. Thanks for listening as always to this and all of our shows. PEACE!!

item.title: Financials looking up at THQ thanks to Saints Row
item.dc:creator: Stephen C

item.title: Ubisoft accused of stealing Assassin's Creed story
item.dc:creator: Stephen C

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 04-15-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: Hello everyone. This weeks the Nerds are all over the place hense the reason we only did a Skype cast for this week. The King is off in the land of the Windy City of Chicago working on treaties and also spending the kingdoms treasury in to the ground. But this week we have The DarkReaper taking the reigns and we cover Sleeping Dogs getting a release date, Mass Effect 3 being a chart topper, Resident Evil coming out earlier, EA wanting to turn Need for Speed into a movie, The Goon goes monthly, Ghangus Khan plans on invading Comics and so so much more. Thanks for baring with us this week as we should be back to our regular setup next week. PEACE!!

item.title: The King's C2E2 Day 2 Coverage
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: That's right it's that time where I give a quick little recap of C2E2 from Day 2 Saturday from Chicago. Took in a couple panels, got some great prints to hang when I get home, and so so much more. Now this is a continuation of what I covered from Day 1 so if you haven't listened to that first I highly recommend it but it isn't nessessary. Thanks for listening. PEACE!!

item.title: C2E2 Coverage Day 1
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: Thats Right folks. We might not have a cast this week. (Still kinda up in the air for this weekend) but fear not my friends your King is coming through with one of his promises. This one being a recap of C2E2. Here is my Friday Day 1 Post C2E2 recap. Some good things about the con and some bad things including one from a major player that totally surprised me so take a listen. We'll see you tomarrow. PEACE!!

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 04-08-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
Hello Everyone! First off this week we want to take a moment and send a special thanks to Mr. JoshStifter and Flush Studios for sending in our opening animation for this week. As sson as I saw it Iknew we had to add it to the show and he was nice enough to allow us that opportunity so ThankYou again Josh. Anyways The cast for this week. Gunner regales us of tales from Anime Detour, Wego over the Eisner Award Nominees, Mass Effect 3 makes its way back into the news with Free DLC,Capt. America 2 gets a release date, Steve Jobs being played by who in his biography movie? Wehave our release date on Nintendo's next console, Sony shuts down another studio, EA names"Wrost Company in America", New DLC coming to Arkham City and so so much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!! Please Note that we may not have a cast for the week of the 15th.
Gaming News Starts about 14 Mins
Movie News Starts about 57 Mins
Comic News Starts about 69 Mins

item.title: Podcast for the week of 04-01-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
This week we cover more TMNT or should we say NT news. We also top Dan Didio's top 10 from DC during his career there, Ultimate Spiderman debuts on Disney XD. AKIRA Creator Katsuhiro Otomo coming back to manga, Jerry Seigel's estate trys to go after Warner Bros., Mass Effect Anime, Assassins Creed 3 news galore, Ken Levine up for Times top 100 most influential people, and or course so so much more from us this week. Thank you for listening as always. PEACE!!
Gaming News Starts about 5 Mins In
Movie News starts about 45 Mins In
Comic News Starts about 62 Mins In

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 03-25-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
This week we have two reviews of Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City and Ninja Gaiden 3. We also talk about the mounting Mass Effect 3 ending rage. Prey 2 might be on the chopping block, Bayonetta making a new appearance, Mickey coming to 360 and PS3?, Shadows of the Damned sequal coming, Kojima working till he dies, EA shutting down some servers soon, Teenage Alien Ninja Turtles?, Smallville Season 11, Hangover 3, New Wolverine Poster, Todd McFarlane coming back to Spawn, Judge Dread to IDW and so so much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!!
Gaming News Starts Approx: 4 mins
Movie News Starts Approx: 36 mins
Comic News Starts Approx: 53 Mins
RE: ORC Review Approx: 65 mins
Ninja Gaiden 3 Review Approx: 80 mins

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 03-18-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
This week we go indepth of the controversy surounding Mass Effect 3. We alos reveal Diablo 3s release date and something that wont ship woth the game, We talk Amazing Spider-Man, XBOX 720 news, Wastelands 2 goes to kickstarter, Resident Evil and Ratchet & Clank get HD remakes, Walking Dead Videogame, MAss Effect the Anime, TMNT's new live-action movie, Y: The Last Man, goes to New Line, Shout Factory and Saban reach a deal, Castle gets Graphic novel, X-treme X-Men on the way, MS. MArvel News, Punisher in Space so much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!!
Gaming News Starts about 7 mins
Movie News Starts about 45 mins
Comic News Starts about 64 mins

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 03-11-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
This week we review Street Fighter X Tekken and of course one of the years most anticipated games...Mass Effect 3!!!. We also talk Peter Molyneux leaving Lionshead Studios, Sorcery and Lollipop Chainsaw getting release dates, Marvel leaves Sega, More Avengers game coming, Ultimate Spider-man News, Shazamm gets a new look, Nick Cage Movie not staring Nick Cage, Static Shock coming to Young Justice?, and so so much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!!
Gaming News: Approx Start at 3 minutes
Comic News: Approx Start at 37 minutes
Street Fighter Review: Approx Start at 68 minutes
Mass Effect 3 Review: Approx Start at 78 minutes

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 03-04-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
This week we review SSX. Also we discuss Mass Effect 3 RPG, Blizzard firing some of its crew, Assassins Creed 3 decided to get Revolutionary, Bioshock gets a release date, Play as Stan Lee in The Amazing Spider-Man, Boondock Saints goes interactive, We find out who's playing RoboCop and Hercules in their upcoming movies respectivly, Walking Dead elects a Govenor, DC shows off Earth 2,Comixology goes print, Marvel shows up in the Apple Bookstore, and so so much more. Thanks for watching and listening as always. PEACE!!
Gaming News Starts around 8:45 Movie News Starts around 45:00 Comics News Starts around 54:00 SSX review Starts around 1:16:00

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 2-26-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description:
This week was a shorter week for the Nerds as President's Day gave us one less day of news but it's all good. We made up for it. This week we announc a returning franchise that finally got a release date, Tema Ninja gives you dialog potions, Mass Effect 3 find it's way up a tree and comes with a couple surprises, Medal of Honor might be making a return, More TMNT game rumors, An NBC show announces it's return and I get yelled at for it, Will Smith returns to "I am Legend"? Static Shock Fan movie starts to heat up on the web, MARVEL making a return to the Sinister 6, Archie joins the Occupy movement, DC nation block announces more shorts and so much more. Thanks for listening. PEACE!!
Gaming News start approx: 5 mins Movie News Starts approx: 33 mins Comic News Starts approx: 49 mins

item.title: Podcast for the week of 2-20-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: This week we review Twisted Metal and UFC Undisputed 3. Is Twisted metal just a cash in of nastalsia or is it worth the 60 in todays market? Find out plus we also talk Garfield, MAx Payne 3 delayed to add "epicness", Double Fine keeps raking in the cash, release dates on Assassins Creed 3, Journey, and Darksiders 2. We also talk about Mass Effect going to space, Transformers 4, The Munsters reboot, Arrow gets its female cast, Walking Dead setting records, Invader Zim teams with Fringe, and so much more. Thanks for listening as always we so do appreciate it. PEACE!!

item.title: Podcast for the Week of 02-12-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: This week we have 3 BIG REVIEWS. Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, Gotham City Imposters, and The Darkness 2. Also Square Enix announced Sleeping Dog in the wake of a cancelled game, Sony says no to North American UMD passport, David Jaffe leaves Eat Sleep Play, Ken Levine shares a secret with Bioshock Infinate, Double Fine rocks Kickstarter, & the possibility of Psychonauts 2?, Machete sequal is a go, Smallville gets a season 11, Ghost Rider can't beat the law, Mr. Freeze announces his return, Fanboys Vs. Zombies and so much more. Thanks for listening as Always. PEACE!!

item.title: Podcast for the week of 2-5-12
item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: On this Super Sunday the nerds come forth from our gridiron bunkers to givith a collasal smackdown as only we can on Final Fantasy 13-2. Also this week we cover the latest console rumors, Bungie giving it up to 343, THQ's financial woes continue, Battlefield 3 reaches 10 million, Old Republic going strong, EA plays with the Online Pass idea, Detroit's favorite son getting a movie reboot?, 'First Class' Reunites, The Beauty wins Pilot Season, and the anouncement that rocked the comic world in the return of the Watchmen! All this and so much more. Thanks for listening as always and we hope you enjoy the show. PEACE!!!

item.dc:creator: Andrew K
item.description: This week the Nerds cover The Witcher 2 coming to 360, The possibillity of TMNT being developed by Rocksteady Studios, BlizzCon being cancelled, THQ aftermath of the big rumor of them shutting down, More rumors of the Xbox 720 surfaced and the possibility of Microsoft ditching the points system. Speaking of ditching ideas Netflix sticks with movies only, SF X Tekken not getting a 360 character, Risistance is done at Insomniac Studios. And in Comics news Marvel comes to SXSW, New Ultimate Spiderman announced, Infinate is cancelled, Capt. Marvel getting a name change?, and so much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!!

This week lots of release dates onShank 2, Starhawk, Diablo 3 maybe?, Resident Evil 6. Also we talk Dr. Who game, The PS Vita, "1999" mode in BioShock Infinite, Hack/Slash becoming a movie, The next season of the Walking Dead, The Lone Ranger, Powers is passed on, CW starting a new DC character Show and much much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!!

The Akira movie just won't go away quite yet, Design a Tricorder and win 7 million dollars and so much more. Thanks for listening as always. PEACE!!
